title: SVG & Generative Geometry Ontology
description: Best practices for generating complex, layered vector graphics and coordinate system management.

coordinate_system.rule: Translate centered geometric constructions to top-left system via post-processing offset.

sanitization.rule: Application-safe IDs: Remove special characters (#) from layer names to prevent Inkscape/Parsing errors.

rendering_performance.strategy: Hybrid Rendering: Pattern-based overlays for high-density layers; individual elements for detail-layers.

safety.rule: Generative Capping: Pre-calculate complexity and cap layer generation to prevent heap-exhausting file sizes.
